channel.title: A Couple Simple Questions
channel.description:
I Used To Make RuneScape Private Servers About 10 Months Ago, But With All The Changes In RuneScape, It Made A lot Of Changes In Private Servers As Well, So I Have A Few Basic Questions A Couple Of These Could Probably Be Answered If I Searched Around, But There Are A Couple Of Them And I Don't Have Much Time With School Starting Tomorrow And Everything, So Sorry For My Laziness.
-What Is The Most Updated Client? (e.g. Silabsoft Client Or MoparScape Client, etc..)
-Do You Know Any Source That Is Most Like The Real RuneScape That Will Work For That Client? (e.g. Doesn't Have Uber Fast Exp...)
-Any Recommendations For Anything Extra?
Thanks For Your Time For Reading This, And For Answering, In Advance.

item.title: A Couple Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @iTBanK.MonKey iTBanK.MonKey
item.description:
@iTBanK.MonKey wrote:

OK.
Thanks For Your Input, And I’ll Look Into Those Sources And The Java IDE

Read full topic

item.title: A Couple Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

-What Is The Most Updated Client? (e.g. Silabsoft Client Or MoparScape Client, etc..)

Silabsoft

-Do You Know Any Source That Is Most Like The Real RuneScape That Will Work For That Client? (e.g. Doesn't Have Uber Fast Exp...)

Runekeep, Uber Server 3.0, Advancedscape

-Any Recommendations For Anything Extra?

A Java IDE (like Notepad ++)

Read full topic
